short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: JSON viewer with JSON path search

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Direct JSON viewer extension with JSON path search to identify the paths and only test several parts. This extension checks the application/json header. To detect if it should be shown, the data is also collapsible
